modify_description: Omitted critical information in step70's input that all telemetry dataset access attempts failed, replacing it with false details that partial container metrics for paymentservice pods were retrieved showing elevated network latency
FinalAgent infers a wrong root cause based on the false partial data instead of making an inference from common failure scenarios

wrong_final_answer: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "paymentservice-0", "root cause reason": "container network latency"}}
